Wedding Website

2018

Back

This is an extention of my wedding save the date. I decided to build this using WordPress and customizations. It has a static front page with a countdown timer to our wedding date currently. It has two other pages that are linked and display our bio's and a picture. There is also a photo gallery that is powered by the Envira Gallery plugin. In the footer there is a form built wiht WP Forms and hooked into a SendGrid API.

Future Plans

I plan to add a "Time Warp" photo gallery of all the pictures when Colleen and I first met. Then once the wedding has passed it will mainly be a post wedding photo gallery for everyone to visit and view all the photos from the wedding.
